title: The Ticwatch 2 is a smartwatch like no other – and it's this week's featured Kickstarter | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Ticwatch2]()  **  [The Dad Shirt](https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-soothe-shirt-dad-shirt-simple-babywearing-baby#/). Don’t get us wrong, we can see the use of theSoothe Shirt – the version of this shirt to help mums breastfeed – but fordads? We’re not so sure.The idea is sound – you want to carry your child while keeping your handsfree. But there are slings that let you do that. There’s no need to build itinto a shirt. What happens when, inevitably, your baby is sick on you and yourDad Shirt needs to be washed? Just buy a sling instead and save yourself somemoney.**Watch The Refresh: The best tech gossip and reviews every week  ******Let us know what you think of this week’s crowdfunding pick in the comments.
